content:
InkCanvasClipboardFormat Enum

Definition

Specifies the formats that an InkCanvas will accept from the Clipboard.

In this Article

public enum InkCanvasClipboardFormat
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
InkCanvasClipboardFormat

Fields

InkSerializedFormat

Indicates that the InkCanvas accepts Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
Text

Indicates that the InkCanvas accepts text.
Xaml

Indicates that the InkCanvas accepts "Extensible Application Markup Language" (XAML) format.
